General.Name: Dinglong Culture Co Ltd
General.Description: Dinglong Culture Co.,Ltd. engages in the film and television businesses in the People's Republic of China. It engages in investment, filming, production, and distribution of film and television dramas. The company is also involved in the mining, washing, and sale of titanium ore; research, development, and operation of games; and research, development, manufacture, and sale of toy products, such as plastic toys, smart toys, model toys, animation toys, and other toys, as well as provision of software and information services. In addition, it engages in technology development and sale of computer software and hardware; development and consulting of network technology; production, reproduction, and distribution of topics, columns, variety shows, cartoons, radio dramas, and TV dramas; design, production, and agency of domestic advertisements; planning, consulting, and organization of cultural and artistic activities; research and development, and consulting of mineral product production technology; tailings recycling; sale of mineral products; and game software and e-commerce platform businesses. Further, the company is involved in the design, manufacture, and sale of models, handicrafts, and hardware and plastic products; sale of household appliances, clothing, bags, leather products, stationery and equipment, and daily necessities; food business; cultural and entertainment brokerage agency; investment consultancy business; and import and export of goods and technology. The company was formerly known as Huawei Culture Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Dinglong Culture Co.,Ltd. in July 2019. Dinglong Culture Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Hilton Garden Inn Dinglong, Guangzhou, China, 510000
